Class WizardAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cjwizard.WizardAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WizardListener

    public class WizardAdapter
extends Object
implements WizardListener
    A convenience class for implemeting parts of the WizardListener interface.
    Author:
    rcreswick
